GameItemType.Description: The Horse part of the Centaur body. This base is used by Centaurs and provides a way to alter the visual appearance of Centaur heroes. It cannot be used by anyone else, and is a visual upgrade only.

The spider part of the Drota body. Do not replace it with another mount.

GameModifier.Provides: This base is required for all Drota. Do not remove it.

GameItemType.Description: Umberdroths are slower than other mounts, but provide excellent protection and superior weight capacity.
Great boars that can break a man's spine in half with their jaws.

GameModifier.Provides: +4 Attack for the first round of combat
+2 Moves for the first round of combat

GameItemType.Description: Great boars that can break a man's spine in half with their jaws.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Attack for the first round of combat
+1 Moves for the first round of combat
This mount cannot be bought in the shop for heroes

GameItemType.Description: Demonhounds are immensely strong beasts that are natively resistant to magic. They are bred alongside the warriors they will eventually carry, and cannot be purchased for heroes to ride.
Dire Bears, albeit slow, are vicious in battle. Their thick fur almost completely protects the rider from arrows.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit is riding a Dire Bear

GameItemType.Description: Icebeasts are vaguely transparent beings of ice capable of vicious assaults. They flow naturally with the movements of their rider.

GameModifier.Provides: 20% Chance to re-roll attack if first melee swing misses (does not work for weapons with Backswing)

GameItemType.Description: Drakes are quick, and allows the rider to ignore 20% of enemy armor against other mounted units

GameModifier.Provides: Rider to ignore 25% of armor when fighting other mounted units

GameItemType.Description: Death Slags have incredibly tough skin, and are native to swamps. Any army with a unit of Mire slag riders can pass through swamps using 1 move instead of 2.

GameModifier.Provides: Army has no movement penalty in Swamps

GameItemType.Description: Mire Slags have incredibly tough skin, and are native to swamps.
Deer are quick and agile, but are not capable of carrying anything beyond their rider.
Deer are quick and agile, but are not capable of carrying anything beyond their rider.
Dark Skaths tend to be born in areas where great battles have been fought. Not necessarily feeding on the dead, they are still somehow a result of the death around them.

GameModifier.Provides: May only be ridden by Undead units and Champions

GameItemType.Description: Far too poisonous for anyone else to ride, the Undead ride these beasts in battle. These mounts may not be purchased for or used for any non-Undead Champion.

GameModifier.Provides: This mount is for non-champions only.

GameItemType.Description: Shadow Drakes have very quick reflexes.
Stalkers are vicious beasts that will devastate other beasts.

GameModifier.Provides: +20 Accuracy when attacking any Beast unless rider counts as Beast

GameItemType.Description: Hergons can be tamed by the Lizardmen - although only the females will allow riders on their back. Their large heads make them ideal for avoiding barrages of arrows.
Wargs improve your Initiative but don't increase your Moves as much as horses.
Wargs improve your Initiative but don't increase your Moves as much as horses.
